_description: Flee the Deadly Sins — five lines

BodDou141.First Lines:
Leue man I byseche þe þe seuen dedly synnes þat
                    þou fle…
BodDou141.Last Lines:
…Who so wole kepe wiþ hys myȝtHis sete is set
                    wyþ seyntes euere in godes syȝt

CULDd1189.First Lines:
Leue man y by seche þeþe seuen dedly sennes þat
                    þu fle…
CULDd1189.Last Lines:
…Who so is take þer inein helle schal be his wonyng
                    inne

BLHar1704.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             Yorkshire Writers.
         2 vols. London, Sonnenschein; New York: Macmillan, 1895-96: 1.111.

BLHar2391.First Lines: lefe broder I be seke þeThe vii hed synnys þat þu fle…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …he þat es takyn In ony of þishe may full sor ben a gryse
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Septem capitalia peccata (centered above text, f. 134)
